params.amountDistributedPerOpen: The number of reward units distributed per open.
params.contents: The reward units to pack in the packs.
params.numOfRewardUnits: The number of reward units to create, for each asset specified in `contents`.
params.openStartTimestamp: The timestamp after which packs can be opened.
params.packUri: The (metadata) URI assigned to the packs created.
params.recipient: The recipient of the packs created.

returns.packId: The unique identifier of the created set of packs.
returns.packTotalSupply: The total number of packs created.

params.amountToOpen: The number of packs to open at once.
params.packId: The identifier of the pack to open.

createPack((address,uint8,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates a pack with the stated contents.

openPack(uint256,uint256).notice: Lets a pack owner open a pack and receive the pack's reward unit.
